00062 /**
00063  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00064  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00065  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00066  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00067  *
00068  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00069  *
00070  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00071  */
00072 SelfCreate* CNAnalysisMethodCNCyto2Gender::
00073 newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00074 {
00075     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00076     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00077     CNAnalysisMethodCNCyto2Gender * pMethod = new CNAnalysisMethodCNCyto2Gender();
00078     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00079 
00080     pMethod->m_dCutoff = setupDoubleParameter("cutoff", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00081 
00082     return pMethod;
00083 }

00094 /**
00095  * @brief Run the analysis.
00096  */
00097 void CNAnalysisMethodCNCyto2Gender::run()
00098 {
00099   Verbose::out(1, "MAJOR PROGRESS UPDATE: Calculating gender.");
00100   Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodCNCyto2Gender::run(...) start");
00101   isSetup();
00102 
00103   determineLocalProbeSets();
00104 
00105   AffxArray<AffxString> vYProbeSetsToProcess;
00106 
00107     affx::TsvFile tsv;
00108     tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00109     AffxString strProbeSetName;
00110 
00111     if ( tsv.open(m_pEngine->getOpt("chrY-probes")) == affx::TSV_OK ) {
00112       int colIx = tsv.getColumnCount(0) -1;
00113       while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK){
00114         tsv.get(0,colIx, strProbeSetName);
00115         if (!strProbeSetName.empty()) {
00116           vYProbeSetsToProcess.add(new AffxString(strProbeSetName));
00117         }
00118       }
00119       tsv.clear();
00120     }
00121 
00122     vYProbeSetsToProcess.quickSort(0);
00123 
00124     CNProbeSetArray * allPsets = getProbeSets();
00125 
00126     // The gender call is all done from chromosome Y.  If it is there,
00127     // it is a male.  If it is not, it is a female.
00128     int not_zero = 0;
00129     int ycount = 0;
00130     pair<int,int>chrY = getChrBounds(m_iYChromosome, getProbeSets());
00131     for (int i=chrY.first; i<chrY.second; i++)
00132         {
00133         // Stay out of autosomal regions.
00134         if (allPsets->at(i)->isPseudoAutosomalRegion()) continue;
00135         AffxString strProbeSetName = allPsets->at(i)->getProbeSetName();
00136         if ((vYProbeSetsToProcess.getCount() > 0) && (vYProbeSetsToProcess.binarySearch(strProbeSetName, 0) == -1)) {continue;}
00137 
00138         // If the probe has copy number > 0 it hints toward a male.
00139         if (allPsets->at(i)->getCNState()) not_zero++;
00140         ycount++;
00141         }
00142     vYProbeSetsToProcess.deleteAll();
00143 
00144     // This may need to be fixed.  For now the algorithm is as simple
00145     // as possible.
00146     double confY = double(not_zero)/ycount;
00147         getExperiment()->setCNCallGenderNotZero(not_zero);
00148         getExperiment()->setCNCallGenderYCount(ycount);
00149     if (confY < m_dCutoff)
00150         {
00151         getExperiment()->setCNCallGender(affx::Female);
00152         getExperiment()->setCNCallGenderConfidence(1.0 - confY);
00153         getExperiment()->setCNCallGenderRatio(confY);
00154         getExperiment()->setCNCallGenderComputed(true);
00155         }
00156 
00157     else
00158         {
00159         getExperiment()->setCNCallGender(affx::Male);
00160         getExperiment()->setCNCallGenderConfidence(confY);
00161         getExperiment()->setCNCallGenderRatio(confY);
00162         getExperiment()->setCNCallGenderComputed(true);
00163         }
00164 
00165         Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodCNCyto2Gender::run(...)\t" + getExperiment()->getExperimentName() + "\tCNGenderRatio\t" + ::getDouble(confY, 6) + "\t" + ((getExperiment()->getCNCallGender() == "male") ? "XY" : "XX") + "\tConfidence\t" + ::getDouble(getExperiment()->getCNCallGenderConfidence(), 6));
00166     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodCNCyto2Gender::run(...) end");
00167     }
00168 
00169 
00170 void CNAnalysisMethodCNCyto2Gender::determineLocalProbeSets()
00171 {
00172         if(m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined)
00173         {
00174                 return;
00175         }
00176         const bool isCytoScanHD = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cytoscan-hd");
00177         int iNumberOfProbeSets=CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getCount();
00178         for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex<iNumberOfProbeSets; iIndex++)
00179         {
00180                 if( CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex)->processAll() )
00181                                 {
00182                                                 if (isCytoScanHD && (!CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex)->processAsCN())) {continue;}
00183                         getProbeSets()->add( CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex));
00184                 }
00185         }
00186         m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined=true;
00187 }
